examples: These attacks and counterattacks between Israel and its enemies come frequently.
He would always go on the offensive, on the counterattack.
Some McCain staff wanted to counterattack, to fight fire with fire.

Obviously myself, our other senior campaign spokespeople tried to counterattack, tried to argue to the American people that this was not just unbecoming of a presidential campaign, but was downright dangerous.

Anyway, due to lack of monkey fireworks, the Chinese counterattacks were unsuccessful, and they eventually signed the treaty of Nanjing, which stated that Britain got Hong Kong and five other treaty ports, as well as the equivalent of two billion dollars in cash.
words.defineEn: to make an attack in response to someone else's attack
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một cuộc tấn công để đáp lại cuộc tấn công của người khác

words.defineVi: để chỉ ra những lỗi lầm hoặc điểm yếu của một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó
